channel.title: Client Error. Please Help
channel.description: Please help me I have no idea what this error could be. I'm using AytonScape Client v8.0 with DeltaScape source. Here's a pic of what happens. It does this every time I try to log in and it just kicks me. [IMG]http://i287.photobucket.com/albums/ll133/jojo12995/error.jpg[/img]

item.title: Client Error. Please Help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“raped by who, post:5, topic:293273”]Its not an anti-leech lol.

Its just an edit Bluurr did, he didnt mean it to prevent people from using the client, or he wouldnt have TOLD PEOPLE HOW TO FIX IT, on the release thread >.>[/quote]

OK… I guessed the anti-leech thing, but he DID make a tut for it but it got removed.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Error. Please Help

item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

Its not an anti-leech lol.

Its just an edit Bluurr did, he didnt mean it to prevent people from using the client, or he wouldnt have TOLD PEOPLE HOW TO FIX IT, on the release thread >.>

item.title: Client Error. Please Help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

r0ckstar96:

I think it’s because the server’s not compatible with the client

Ye, thats what I meant, not compatible because it needs server-side editing as Bluur put a clever anti-leech in the client that makes it need server-side edits.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Error. Please Help
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

I think it’s because the server’s not compatible with the client

Read full topic

item.title: Client Error. Please Help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I don’t know if this is your case but that comes up when you have a bluur client and you have changed the IP address in the client to something different, but you have not done server side edits as well. Does it log you out when you login, almost instantly?? (Only having showed a black screen where the interface should be)

If it is, the server side edits are fairly easy, but I don’t know them. I came across this problem while making my client, so in the end I used a different one.

Read full topic
